p: Moreover, among about 1.5 million in Marche population, 5826 people are infected explains that atleast four per a thousand inhabitants were tested positve. Other than Marche, the at least infected inhabitants in Lombardy was 7–8 (95% CI), in Emila-Romagna was 5–6 (95% CI), in Piedmont was 4–5 (95% CI), and Veneto was 3–4 (95% CI) were recorded per thousand residents. However, compared to mentioned Italian regions, Marche is attaining a good recovery rate under implementing local governor health policies.
